categories: Category:Battles of the Emperor's ritual crisis

nodes.text: During the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, the Jedi Knight known as the Hero of Tython embarked on a mission to the Imperial space station Korriban's Flame in the Unknown Regions. Searching for the Zabrak Jedi Jomar Chul, who had gone missing on a previous mission to investigate why high-ranking Sith Lords were gathering on a station, the Hero instead found the fallen Jedi Leeha Narezz holding Chul captive. After a fierce battle, Narezz was defeated and the Emperor's control over her broken, and Chul informed the Knight that he had overheard Narezz speaking with a Lord Fulminiss on the planet Voss.
